tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicVariationData (
    variation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    chromosome_number INT,
    position_on_chromosome INT,
    effect_on_protein TEXT,
    disease_association VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE disease_association (
  association_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  variation_id INT,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  symptoms TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (variation_id) REFERENCES genetic_variation(variation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    position INT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
    disease_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mutation_implications (
    implication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mutation_id UUID REFERENCES mutations(mutation_id),
    disease_id UUID REFERENCES diseases(disease_id),
    effect VARCHAR(100),
    severity VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Variations (
  variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  variation_type VARCHAR(30),
  impact_score FLOAT,
  disease_association VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  genotype VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  dob DATE,
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  gene_involved VARCHAR(50),
  risk_factor FLOAT,
  clinical_manifestation VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE mutations ( 
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    gene_name TEXT, 
    nucleotide_change TEXT, 
    amino_acid_change TEXT, 
    mutation_type TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE patients ( 
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_name TEXT, 
    age INT, 
    gender TEXT, 
    diagnosis_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE variants ( 
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    variant_name TEXT, 
    variant_type TEXT, 
    variant_classification TEXT, 
    chromosome TEXT, 
    position INT 
);

CREATE TABLE studies ( 
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    study_name TEXT, 
    study_description TEXT, 
    researcher_name TEXT, 
    publication_date DATE 
);
